Package com.github.eyers.activities.settings

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppCompatPreferenceActivity
    A PreferenceActivity which implements and proxies the necessary calls to be used with AppCompat.
    AppSettingsActivity
    This class will contain a list of settings in which the user can use to navigate to various preferred app settings.
    CategoryManagementSettings
    This class will handle category management settings events based on the user's selection.
    DeleteCategory
    DeleteCategory.
    DisplaySettingsActivity
    This class will handle display settings events based on the user's preference
    ItemManagementSettings
    This class will handle item management settings based on the user's preference.
    SettingUtilities
    Utilities to support the library.
    SoundSettings
    This class will handle sound settings events based on the user's selection.
Author:
Matthew Van der Bijl, Nathan Shava, ​Emilde ​Arsenio, ​Andrea ​Cloete, Sajaad Ishmail
